other_title: City Hunter Special: Un complotto da un milione di dollari (Italian)
City Hunter: Complot pour 1 million de dollars (French)
City Hunter: Hyakuman Dollar no Inbou (Japanese)
City Hunter: La conspiración del millón de dólares (Spanish)
City Hunter: Un complotto da un milione di dollari (Italian)
シティーハンター 百万ドルの陰謀 (Japanese)
城市獵人 百萬美元的陰謀 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: Beautiful American Emily O'Hara offers the City Hunter (Ryo Saeba & Kaori Makimura) one million dollars to protect her from a man named Douglas. Ryo & Kaori take the job, but things are not quite what they seem. The real target just might be Ryo, but it's unclear who wants Saeba dead.
ending_theme: "More, More Shiwase (More, More Happiness)" by Yoko Oginome
